0: Spacious rooms great location and all you need for a terrific holiday base
I will definately recommend The Travelodge to all my friends and family
I had the loveliest for a staycation at the Travelodge La Jola Beach
I have made numerous 2 5 day business trips to La Jola and have tried different hotels
WILL DEFINITELY RECOMMEND THIS PLACE TO FAMILY AND FRIENDS AND WILL PROBABLY BE STAYING HERE AGAIN
The room was comfy and clean with a separate makeup table magnified mirror so that my family could shower while I was doing my makeup for the day
And at least there is a real vacation atmosphere
1: Breakfast was ok for a snack kind of bland for the family tastes but doable if you are in a hurry
FYI management some of us go on vacation to escape from such things
2: Its great I am going there with more family to stay longer in about a week
